title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in tikka masala paste.
Cook onion until soft, then add tomato puree.
Stir in cream and serve hot.
